title: Creamy Parmesan Polenta
directions: Stir polenta and chicken broth together in a saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until the polenta is heated through completely, about 5 minutes.
Remove pan from heat. Stir Parmesan cheese, black pepper, and paprika with the polenta mixture.
ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) package polenta, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
